column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been here 2x so far
column2: and I am already looking forward to coming back.  There are many great baked options.  Coffee is a must
column3: as the pastries are on the buttery side.  Seating is hard to come by
column4: so plan to come early in the morning for best seating.  They offer plenty of parking
column5: which is really nice in this motor-city.
